title: Basil resigns
body_lines: SLPP National list MP Basil Rajapaksa resigned from his Parliamentary seat today.
Parliament sources told Dailymirror that Mr. Rajapaksa met Parliament Secretary General Dammika Dassanayake this morning and handed over the resignation.
Sergeant-at-arms Narendra Fernando also confirmed that Mr. Rajapaksa had met the Secretary General of Parliament. (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
